name: SoM Soul Of Mask
description: Soul of Mask (SoM) is a labyrinth game where the spirit tries to collect Demon eyes to leave the underworld. Controllers: Touch Screen, Keyboard, Joystick.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 192 MB RAM Graphics: quadro 3100M Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GForce Storage: 256 GB available space
